Latest: 有的人会选择在最危险的时候走到这里，为的是能看到这片大地的所有变化，为的是能把这里的种种记录和景象，带回文明世界。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 玻利维亚的黑流树海，卡西米尔的环山高地平原，伊比利亚的水下火山......这些地方，过去都没有人去过。
English: Bolivia's forests, Kazimierz's mountain plains, Iberia's underwater volcanoes... These places have never been visited by anyone before.

Name: Magallan
Latest: 但是，现在，已经有人去过了，在那里，已经插上了探险家们的旗帜。
English: Now, someone has been there to explore. The explorers' flag has been planted.

Name: Magallan
Latest: 这片大地上还有许多我们未曾踏足的地方，但那也只是说，我们还没来及踏足。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 今天，这片冰原已经有我踏足了，那么，未来，总会有更多的人来到这里。
English: Today, I have treak through this ice field, so, in the future, there will always be more people coming here.

Name: Magallan
Latest: 我们也不会知道，他们是在什么条件下走来的。

Name: Simona
Latest: 如果终你一生，都没有后来者呢？

Name: Simona
Latest: 如果你回去之后，这个科考站就会被废弃呢？

Name: Magallan
Latest: 我也不能为两个月后的那一点点可能性，放弃哪怕是一位不存在的探险家。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 西蒙娜姐......麦哲伦我，相信探险这种事业，相信探险家这种人。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 总有一天，我们的足迹会遍布这一整片大地。

Name: Simona
Latest: ......把希望寄托于可能不会发生的未来，真的不会失望吗？
English: ... You won't feel disappointed at all if we place our hopes in a future that may not happen?

Name: Magallan
Latest: 没关系的，对探险家来说，我们一生都在发现，我们也一生都在失望。
English: That's fine. As explorers, we spend our lives discovering new things, and we spend our lives being disappointed on things.

Name: Magallan
Latest: 没有探险家的发现是仅仅依靠自己完成的，每一个探险家都是站在前人的肩膀上，每一个重大的发现都连接着遥远的过去。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 就好像我会来到这片冰原，一开始，只是因为在小时候听了一个故事。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 但是，现在我已经知道，无论我喜欢的那些存在不存在，我所做的，都有意义。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 哪怕只是那个虚无缥缈的，会让人失望的不存在的意义。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 唉这个加热器，功率会不会太大......上次把头发都烤焦了欸。不管，硬上啦！

Name: Simona
English: ... I kind of understand.

Name: Magallan
Latest: 嗯！那我去了！

Name: Simona
Latest: 那么，我替你去吧。
English: Very well, I'll go in your stead.

Name: Magallan
Latest: 欸？

Name: Magallan
Latest: 西蒙娜姐，你是来找人的吧？我们观测站没有雇佣其他雇员的需求哦！

Name: Simona
Latest: 我已经找到那个人了。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 欸。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 欸，就是麦哲伦我吗？

Name: Simona
Latest: 环境已经变得相当恶劣，预定要来的信使没法通知你了。

Name: Simona
Latest: 容我重新自我介绍一下。罗德岛干员，代号“寒檀”。我是来接你的。当然，你可以继续叫我西蒙娜。

Name: Simona
Latest: 接下来的工作让我来做。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 不行。外面的环境太危险了！

Name: Simona
Latest: 刚刚这句话，是我说的吧？

Name: Magallan
Latest: 不行不行不行，我可是科考人员，这是我的责任！

Name: Simona
Latest: 不要小看我。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 欸。

Name: Simona
Latest: 告诉我修理的方法，干员麦哲伦。外面的事情请交给我。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 那，那我知道了！这个，给你！

Name: Simona
Latest: 这是？

Name: Magallan
Latest: 按下这个按钮，我就会立刻出来找你！还有这个装备，这个装备......

Name: Simona
Latest: 呵呵，谢谢你......

Name: Simona
Latest: 我真的找对人了呢。不用了，麦哲伦。

Name: Magallan
Latest: 不可以！我可不能让西蒙娜......

Name: Simona
Latest: 不。干员麦哲伦......相信我。

Name: Simona
Latest: 这片土地也一样信任着我。

Name: Simona
Latest: 我们一生都在发现，也一生都在失望，吗。
English: We spend our whole lives discovering new things, and we spend our whole lives being disappointed on things, huh?

Latest: 愚蠢的萨米人，这种抵抗有什么意义？
你确实很厉害，我们走不出这场暴风雪了。
那又怎么样？乌萨斯依然会碾压你们，吞下你们的城市，吃掉你们的土地！
女巫......我们不会杀掉你。
我们会死，我们却要你活！你要活着，你要看整片大地都染血！
这东西送给你。我们这些死人的礼物，收下！用你的一只眼睛，收下！
惨叫啊，哭啊，然后活着！
我们死得光荣，你活得卑微！而且......你要一直活着！！
女巫！

Name: Simona
Latest: 真是的。我以前怎么总是觉得这片大地会枯萎呢？

Name: Simona
Latest: 只要有这样的孩子在，大地就会一直挣扎着繁茂下去才对。

Name: Simona
Latest: 放心吧，麦哲伦。有些事情对你来说还太难了，交给我们大人去做，我们也会很开心啊。

Name: Simona
Latest: “......白色的生命肆意绽放，漆黑的种子深植土壤......♪”

Name: Simona
Latest: “歌唱吧，美丽的女孩。哭泣吧，美丽的女孩♪”

Name: Simona
Latest: “风雪会听见你的歌，也会拥你入怀♪”

Name: Simona
Latest: ——北地的风雪，听见歌声了吗？

Name: Simona
Latest: 麦哲伦......我啊，想看你坚持自己的梦想。

Name: Simona
Latest: 是啊，雪也该停了。
莱茵生命临时极地科考点，时间XX-XX-XX
English: Rhine Lab temporary polar research site, XX-XX-XX

Latest: 唉，早知道就不答应梅尔姐姐测试这个签到系统了，好奇怪的功能啊......
English: *Sigh* If I had known about this, I would not have agreed with sister May's (Mayor) request to test this check-in system. What a strange feature...

Latest: 写报告可真是我最不擅长的东西了，还是来听听梅尔姐姐的声音吧。
English: Writing a report is not what I'm good at. Let's listen to sister May voice!

Latest: 欸？！之前有这一段吗......难道是梅尔姐姐偷偷录的然后设置了触发条件？
English: What? ! Was there a recording like this before... Did sister May secretly recorded it and set the trigger?

Latest: 虽然说这才是常态啦，要是缪缪在肯定要批评我贪心了。
English: Although this is the norm, if MueMue (Muesys) was here she would criticize me of being too greedy.

Latest: 呜哇，赶紧找找，这个要是丢了我可要被梅尔姐姐杀掉了！
English: Uwah, I gotta find it fast. If I lose this, sister May will definately kill me!

Latest: 呼，好险好险，原来被我塞在防寒服的口袋里忘了。
English: Whew, I almost lost it, turns out I put it in my winter coat pocket and forgot all about it.

Latest: 不过，我带在身上这么久没去管它都没出事，应该已经证明了它的低温耐性了......吧？
English: But, I haven't had a problem with it being on me for so long, which should have proved its low temperature tolerance... ?

Latest: 唔，虽然这一项只是梅尔姐姐私下拜托我的任务，不过还是应该再严谨一点才行。
English: Well, although this is a private request that sister May asked me to do, I should be a little more serious.

Latest: 好吧，反正现在是暴风雪，干脆把它放到门外去摆一天看看好了。
English: Alright then, there's a blizzard going on anyways, so let's just leave the new material outside for a day.

Latest: 现在外面的气温应该是最低的了。
English: The temperature outside should be the lowest now.

Latest: 鬼啊！！！
English: A ghost!!!

Latest: 我刚才好像看到了一个超级漂亮的大姐姐，但是，这里可是极北之地，怎么可能会有人？
English: I thought I saw a gorgeous woman, but this is the far north. How could there be anyone here?

Latest: 难、难道说东国的雪女传说是真的？！
English: C-could it be that Yuki Onna legend from the east country is true? !

Latest: 不行不行，我要再开门看看，这可是惊天大发现！
English: I must find out! I'll open the door again. What a discovery if it's true!

Latest: 哇，是真的雪女！
English: Wow, it's really a Yuki Onna!

Latest: ......不对，这标志性的装束，加上耳朵，什么呀，原来只是萨米人吗。
English: ... Wait, something's not right, this clothing logo, plus the ears. Huh? It's just a Sámian (Sámi).

Latest: 虽然不知道哪里让你失望了，不过我确实是萨米人。你好，小姑娘。
English: I don't know where I let you down, but I am indeed a Sámian (Sámi). Nice to meet you, young lady.

Latest: 你好，漂亮的姐姐。总之，虽然不知道你是怎么到这里来的，不过先进来吧。
English: Nice to meet you as well, beautiful lady. Anyway, I don't know how you got here, but come on in.

Latest: 即使是萨米人，对这样的暴风雪也没辙吧。
English: Even a Sámian (Sámi) would have a hard time in this blizzard.

Latest: 你可以叫我西蒙娜，你呢？
English: You can call me Simona. What about yours?

Latest: 我叫麦哲伦，是这座观测站的负责人......说是这么说，其实现在只有我一个人在用啦。
English: My name's Magallan, and I'm the head of this observatory... Actually, I'm the only one using it right now.

Latest: 原来如此。
English: I see.

Latest: 西蒙娜姐姐为什么你会来这样的地方？
English: So Simona, why would you come to a place like this?

Latest: 找人？这里可是极北之地哦，别说人了，我一个月连生物都见不到几只呢。
English: Looking for a person? This far in the north? I haven't seen a living creature in a month, let alone a person.

Latest: 因为这场暴风雪将会持续很久很久，现在不回去，恐怕会有很久都回不去了，我是来接她的。
English: Because this blizzard is going to last for a longer time. If we don't go back now, I'm afraid we won't be able to return for some time. I'm here to pick her up, you see.

Latest: 咦，是这样吗？！
English: Oh, I understand now!

Latest: 我还想等它弱一点了再走呢，这样的话，反而要趁现在它还没有变大先走了。
English: I wanted to wait until it was a little weaker, but if that's the case, then I must leave now before it becomes even bigger.

Latest: 西蒙娜姐姐，不好意思，我要先准备一些东西。
English: Simona, I'm sorry for the wait. But I have to get some things ready first.

Latest: 麦哲伦，需要我帮忙吗？
English: Magallan, do you need my help?

Latest: 好吧。你是在这里工作吗?
English: Alright. Do you work here?

Latest: 嗯，我在这里做勘测工作。
English: Yes, I do survey work here.

Latest: 勘测什么？
English: Surveying what?

Latest: 勘测这片冰原，寻找它过去的历史。
English: Surveying the ice sheet and searching for past history.

Latest: 只有你一个人？
English: Just you alone?

Latest: 嗯......一开始是有不少研究员一起过来的，不过最后他们都受不了这里的气候和枯燥，所以回去了。
English: Yes... At first there were a lot of researchers with me, but in the end they couldn't stand the climate and boredom, so they went back.

Latest: 你呢？
English: How are you feeling?

Latest: 我习惯了，毕竟我已经做勘测工作好多年啦。
English: I'm used to it. After all, I've been doing surveying work for years.

Latest: ......你不讨厌那些抛弃你的人吗？
English: ... You don't hate those who left you here?

Latest: 嗯......虽然没有能说话的人是有点遗憾，不过我也知道不是每个人都能像我一样乐在其中啦。
English: Hmm... althought it's a pity there's no one to talk to, but I know not everyone enjoys this kind of work as much as I do.

Latest: 哦，不过梅尔姐姐说我好像养成了下意识自言自语的习惯。有吗？应该没有吧？
English: Oh, but sister May says I seem to have developed a habit of talking to myself subconsciously. Am I doing it now? Probably not, right?

Latest: 就算是有，也没有问题，你就这样就很好。
English: Even so, that's not a big problem. You're fine.

Latest: 嘿嘿，是这样吗？
English: Hehe, is that so?

Latest: 呵呵，是的。
English: *Chuckles* Yes.

Latest: 麦哲伦，你知道我是感染者吧？
English: Magallan, you know I'm infected, right?

Latest: 欸，嗯，毕竟西蒙娜姐姐你也没有怎么去掩盖。
English: I do, after all, you didn't do much to cover yourself up.

Latest: 啊，这个不用担心哦，我们莱茵生命前年的研究表明，矿石病在人之间的传染其实条件很限定的，并没有人们想的那么可怕。
English: Ah, don't worry about that. Rhine Lab research on the year before shows that the transmission of Oripathy between people is actually very limited and not as terrible as people think.

Latest: 啊，对了，我这次出发前，梅尔姐姐说接下来可能要和一个叫做“罗德岛”的组织合作了。
English: Oh, by the way, before I leave, sister May said she might be working with an organization called Rhodes Island.

Latest: 听说对方有能够抑制矿石病的技术呢，这可厉害了，我们都没有这样的技术。
English: Rumor has it that they have the technology to suppress Oripathy, that's impressive of them, Rhine Lab doesn't have such technology.

Latest: 西蒙娜姐姐你要是想的话，回去之后可以来莱茵生命找我，我带你去治病。
English: Simona if you want to, you can come back to Rhine Lab and find me, I will seek treatment for you.

Latest: 你不怕我是坏人吗？
English: Aren't you afraid I could be a bad person?

Latest: 西蒙娜姐姐是坏人吗？
English: Is Simona a bad person?

Latest: 我觉得姐姐这么漂亮，一定是好人。
English: I think you're beautiful, so you must be a good person.

Latest: 是吗？
English: Really?

Latest: 警报，检测到温控设施出现异常，即将关闭供暖功能。
English: Warning. Abnormality in the temperature control system detected. Heating will be turned off soon.

Latest: 让我看看监控系统。
English: Let me check the surveillance system.

Latest: 糟了，好像是冰雹破开了供暖管道。
English: Oh, no. It looks like hail broke the heating pipe.

Latest: 这可不行，要立刻进行维修。
English: This can't be left unrepaired. I must repair it immediately.

Latest: 快些收拾好行李直接离开不就好了吗？
English: Why don't you just pack up and leave?

Latest: 不行。就这么离开的话，暴风雪会彻底破坏供暖设备。
English: I can't. If I just leave, the blizzard will completely destroy the heating system.

Latest: 修理很麻烦吗？
English: Is it difficult to repair?

Latest: 唔嗯......管道被设置在比较高的地方，这个天气要爬上去的话，有点难。
English: Uh-huh... The pipe is set up at a high place, which is a little difficult to climb in this weather.

Latest: 那么，等到明年再来重新维修不就好了吗？你每年都会来的对吧？
English: So, why not wait until next year to repair it? You come here every year, right?

Latest: 不，这座观测站，并不是只是为我而存在的，它建立的意义，是为所有可能会来到这里的探险家提供一个居所。
English: That's not the point, this observatory does not exist just for me, it is built to provide a home for all explorers who might come here.

Latest: 这样的话，你的坚持又有什么意义呢？
English: So what's the point of your insistence in repairing it?

Latest: 因为，总有一天，会有人经过这里。
English: Because, one day, someone will pass through here.

Latest: 这只是毫无根据的想法而已。
English: That's just a baseless thought.

Latest: 不是的。
English: No it's not.

Latest: 这片大地上还有许多我们未曾踏足的地方，但那也只是说，我们还没踏足。
English: There are many places on this land where we have not yet set foot, but that is only to say that we have not yet set foot.

Latest: 即使只是为了这样的可能性，就已经值得我这么去做了。
English: As long as the possibility exists, then it's all worth it.

Latest: 那如果终你一生，都没有后来者呢？
English: What if no one comes here in your lifetime?

Latest: 那我就会告诉我的孩子，告诉我的接班人，告诉莱茵生命的其他人，让他们维护好这里。
English: Then I would tell my children, tell my successors, and tell the rest of Rhine Lab to please maintain this place.

Latest: 因为总有一天，我们的足迹会遍布这一整片大地。
English: Because there will be a day, where our footprints will be all over this vast land.

Latest: 没有探险家的发现是仅仅依靠自己完成的，每一个探险家都是站在前人的肩膀上，每一个重大的发现连接着遥远的过去。
English: No complete explorer's discovery relies on their own, every explorer is standing on the shoulders of predecessors, every major discovery connected with the distant past.

Latest: 就好像我会来到这片冰原，一开始，只是因为在小时候听了一个故事，但是，现在我已经知道，我所追求的，或许是存在的。
English: Just as I had come to this ice sheet, at first, because I had heard a story of this place as a child. Now I know that what I'm seeking for might exist.

Latest: 欸，但是西蒙娜姐姐，你还要找人吧？
English: Huh, Simona, weren't you looking for someone?

Latest: 小傻瓜，你难道还没发现，我要找的就是你吗？
English: Don't you see, little fool, that you're the one I'm looking for?

Latest: 咦？找我？
English: What? Looking for me?

Latest: 我不是说了吗，因为这片风雪太大了，预定的信使已经无法进入这里了，所以梅尔小姐委托我来迎接你回罗德岛。
English: As I said, the couriers are no longer able to get in because of the blizzard, so Miss Mayer has entrusted me with your return to Rhodes Island.

Latest: 欸，梅尔姐姐？罗德岛？
English: Huh, sister May? Rhodes Island?

Latest: 呵呵，是的。
English: *Chuckles* Yes.

Latest: 那么，容我重新自我介绍一下。
English: Well, allow me reintroduce myself.

Latest: 罗德岛干员，代号“至霜”。我是来接你的。当然，你可以继续叫我西蒙娜。
English: Rhodes Island operator, code name "Amona". I'm here to bring you back. Of course, you can keep calling me Simona.

Latest: 这样啊......但是，真的可以拜托西蒙娜姐姐你吗？
English: I see... But, is it really alright of me to ask for your help, Simona?

Latest: 放心，冰雪是我的挚友，是我的亲人。对我来说，现在的外面，如同春天一般温暖。
English: Rest assured, ice and snow is my friend and family. It's like spring out there to me.

Latest: 哇，好厉害。
English: Wow, that's awesome.

Latest: 呵呵......那么，你可以告诉我，该怎么维修管道，然后在这里乖乖收拾你的行李。
English: Haha... Then, you can tell me how to fix the pipes and then pack up your things here.

Latest: 好的！
English: Okay!

Latest: 愚蠢的萨米人，你们的抵抗没有意义，总有一天，乌萨斯会吞并你们。
English: Stupid Sámian (Sámi), your resistance is meaningless. One day, Ursus will swallow you up.

Latest: 恶魔，**，去死，去死啊！！！！
English: Devil, **, die, die!!!!

Latest: 啐，恶魔，你的战争结束了，留着你那只瞎掉的眼睛滚回萨米去吧！
English: *Spit*, demon, your war is over, keep that blind eye of yours and go back to Sámi!

Latest: 谢谢你，麦哲伦。
English: Thank you so much, Magallan.

Latest: “暴风雪从脚下升起，寒风与霜雪遍布全境。”
English: "Blizzard rises from below, its wind, its frost and snow shall cover the whole land."

Latest: “留下纯白，生机还有那漆黑的种子。”
English: "Leaving pure white, life, and dark seeds."

Latest: “抵抗自然已经耗尽了人们的心力。”
English: "Resistance to nature has exhausted the human heart."

Latest: “但总有一些别有用心的家伙早已准备好尖刀，只为饱尝同伴的鲜血。”
English: "But there are always people with ulterior motives who are ready to eat the blood of their own kind."

Latest: “歌唱吧，美丽的女孩。悲泣吧，美丽的女孩。”
English: "Sing, pretty maiden. Weep, fair maiden."

Latest: “你将变作霜雪，你将化成寒风，你永不灭。”
English: "You will become frost and snow, you will become the cold wind, and you will become immortal."
